interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Godefroy Tint Kit for Spot Coloring, Dark Brown
Review Date: 2016/07/04
Store: Godefroy
Product Description: ['Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Color': 'Dark Brown', 'Brand': 'Godefroy', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.5 x 2.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '203', 'UPC': '852661595933 604106323737 186297000067 726714358472 801276566487', 'Manufacturer': 'Godefroy'}
Review Text: Really worth the buy, my eyebrows are black and this color is perfect. This product really helps out if you are trying to grow out your natural eyebrows.
Review Title: Great product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Creamily

Japan 100gram 3Cup Size Must Up Breast & Butt Enlargment Cream Pueraria Mirifica (3 Tubes 100g)
Must Up
['Correct Massage Techniques: Step 1: Spread the cream to the breast all around. Step 2: The body slightly to bend down, both hands pat the breast base, and upwardly pushes 10 times of each. Step 3: Pushes from the armpit to the cleavage 10 times of each. Step 4: With the middle finger and the ring finger, pulls several times of the chest ligament, is helpful to strength the breast and enhancement. Tips : 1) During the first week of using, massage twice a day in the morning and at night. 2) It is more effective to use the cream after taking a bath. 3) When your bust becomes fuller, remember to wear bras that fit and massage your bust every day.']
{'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '100 Grams', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 4.2 x 1.7 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Date First Available': 'December 30, 2013', 'Manufacturer': 'Must Up'}
I like it I used the whole cream, I did not really see a different in size of my boobs or my butt, but it did make for a good moisturizer, which always helps with stretch marks.
meh not bad, not good

Godefroy Tint Kit for Spot Coloring, Dark Brown
Godefroy
['Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Category**: The user remains passionate about hair extensions and is increasingly focused on effective hair coloring solutions, particularly for targeted applications. Their interest now includes products that facilitate spot coloring for finer areas such as facial hair and roots.

- **Preferences**: The user prioritizes high-quality, thicker extensions made from natural materials and values products that allow for precise coloration. Their skincare choices reflect a focus on effective moisturization with practical benefits rather than purely cosmetic enhancements.

- **Hair Type**: They engage with diverse products suited for various hair types, including tools for detailed coloring applications, highlighting their versatility in hair care.

- **Review Behavior**: The user provides insightful feedback, frequently commending product effectiveness and addressing concerns like color blending and waste reduction. Their ratings consistently reflect a preference for dependable results in extensions and targeted coloring solutions.

- **Trends**: They actively explore innovative coloring products that enable versatility and precision in grooming, demonstrating a commitment to enhancing their beauty routine.

- **Quality Criteria**: The user values high-quality hair extensions and effective coloring solutions, emphasizing tangible outcomes that address common challenges.

- **Overall Attitude**: They exhibit enthusiasm for new purchases, showcasing a willingness to try various beauty and personal care products that meet specific needs, as indicated by their positive reviews of reliable, functional coloring solutions.
